gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc
Class JdbcConnectionProviderImpl

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc.JdbcConnectionProviderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceWrapper, JdbcConnectionProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
HibernateSessionProviderImpl
public class JdbcConnectionProviderImpl
extends Object
implements JdbcConnectionProvider

Implementation of JdbcConnectionProvider that will load a database driver and create a connection. Information about the driver and the connection is provided by a Properties object.

getConnection

public Connection getConnection()
Description copied from interface: JdbcConnectionProvider
Gets a connection to the database.

Specified by:
getConnection in interface JdbcConnectionProvider
Returns:
Returns a database connection ready to be used.

getDbSchema

public String getDbSchema()
Description copied from interface: JdbcConnectionProvider
Gets the database schema (tables qualifier) string. This string will replace the schema key used in SQL statements. If this method returns null, then there will be no replacement of the schema key and the SQL statement will be executed without any modification.

Specified by:
getDbSchema in interface JdbcConnectionProvider
Returns:
Returns the schema of the database tables.
